    • Method Detail

      • addLandHexes

        private void addLandHexes(ICatanMap map,
                java.util.List<Hex> hexes,
                java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> numbers,
                java.util.List<HexType> types)
        Worker function which loops through the provided List of hexes, assigns them a number and sticks them in the map
        Parameters:
        map - map to manipulate
        hexes - list of hexes to be used in the map
        numbers - list of corresponding numbers to be used in the map
        types - list of corresponding types to be used in the map

      • setupLandHexes

        public void setupLandHexes(ICatanMap map,
                  boolean randomizeNumbers,
                  boolean randomizeHexTypes)
        Sets up the default land hexes, assigning a number to each. If the second parameter is true, the numbers will be random
        Specified by:
        setupLandHexes in interface IMapBuilder
        Parameters:
        map - map to manipulate
        randomizeNumbers - indicates whether to randomize numbers
        randomizeHexTypes - indicates whether to randomize hex types

      • getDefaultHexTypes

        private java.util.List<HexType> getDefaultHexTypes()
        Gets all possible land hex types in clockwise order from the northwest
        Returns:
        list of all types of hexes in a valid Catan Default Map

      • getDefaultNumbers

        private java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getDefaultNumbers()
        Gets all possible land hex numbers in clockwise order from the northwest
        Returns:
        list of all numbers in a Default CatanMap

      • getDefaultMapLocations

        private java.util.List<Hex> getDefaultMapLocations()
        Gets all possible land hex locations in clockwise order from the northwest
        Returns:
        list of all valid locations for a land hex in a Default CatanMap

      • setupPorts

        public void setupPorts(ICatanMap map,
              boolean randomize)
        Stores all Ports to the map in the default fashion
        Specified by:
        setupPorts in interface IMapBuilder

      • getPossiblePortLocations

        private java.util.List<EdgeLocation> getPossiblePortLocations()

      • setUpPorts

        private void setUpPorts(ICatanMap map,
              java.util.List<EdgeLocation> locations)
        Worker method which loops through all Port locations and adds them to the map
        Parameters:
        map - map to manipulate
        locations - list of port locations (may or may not be randomized)
